member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.WebinarsController.GetWebinar(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the webinar with the specified identifier, if it exists.
member.returns: The webinar with the specified identifier, if it exists.

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.WebinarsController.CreateWebinar(Application.Webinars.Commands.CreateWebinar.CreateWebinarRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new webinar based on the specified request.
member.returns: The identifier of the newly created webinar.
